      • calculateVel

        public void calculateVel(App app,
                         double a,
                         double b,
                         double c,
                         double d)
        pass app and 4 double value, to calculate which normal vector is we need then set the velocity.
        参数:
        app - App
        a - the first point x coordinate
        b - the first point y coordinate
        c - the second point x coordinate
        d - the second point y coordinate
